title: looking for a beater t202 for my son for xmas
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: looking for a beater t202 for my son for xmas
posts.post_content: Looking to buy a t202 in the $15-25 range for my son for xmas. Condition not a factor other then d like itto be in one piece. Thanks for your help :)
bumping for one last try. really hoping to give my son a t202 for xmas.

Checked on ebay for you. Found a PSA 2 T202 for $35.00. Not mine but saw this on ebay.

[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/t202-Hassan-Scrambling-back-to-first-Bergen-Barger-psa2_W0QQitemZ360199065684QQcmdZViewItemQQptZUS_Baseball?hash=item53dd899054[/url]
